sections.heading: Furiosa Device API
sections.text:
A set of APIs to list and retrieve information of FuriosaAI's NPU devices. To learn more about FuriosaAI's NPU, please visit
https://furiosa.ai
.

sections.heading: Before you start
sections.text:
This crate requires FuriosaAI's NPU device and its kernel driver. Currently, FuriosaAI offers NPU devices for only users who register Early Access Program (EAP). Please contact
contact@furiosa.ai
to learn how to start the EAP. You can also refer to
Driver, Firmware, and Runtime Installation
to learn the kernel driver installation.

sections.heading: Documentation for Rust
sections.text:
To render docs in local, please use a command as below (*requires nightly):
cd
device-api
cargo rustdoc --lib --all-features -- --cfg docsrs

sections.heading: For Python
sections.text:
The Python API for FuriosaAI's NPU device is available
here
.

metadata.description: APIs that offers NPU devices' information and allow to control the devices
